title: Sefaria Community,
text: In honor of Shavuot, we are counting towards the goal of recruiting 180 new Sefaria Sustainers. Through recurring monthly donations, our current Sustainers (800+) cover a significant portion of what Sefaria needs to raise each year!
If you sign up today, you can keep Jewish texts free and growing on Sefaria all year round! A recurring gift of $15, $10, or even $5 can make a real difference.
The future of Torah is in your hands. Can we count on you?
name: shavuot-2021-3
